bwwExcerpt: You can't say the new musical "Gettin' the Band Back Together" doesn't try hard. At one point somebody shoots T-shirts into the audience from a cannon. Marilu Henner, who plays the lead's mom, passes along Rice Krispies Treats during the intermission. Throughout, the game cast sells the action with undeniable energy - if Broadway quality was measured in sweat, "Gettin' the Band Back Together" would be a shoo-in for a Tony. Unfortunately, other factors must be considered. The show is a willfully
